attributes.action: Enforce local Enforcement officers  to follow up complaints from house holders after thier initial visit and update them of thier actions instead of ignoring them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have experiance of local enforcement officers ignoring emails from complainants and not up dating them on there actions and in one instance the sarga was on going for five years without the apropriate action. although illegal use of domestic premises as a business and ground works contrctor as well as storing soil and building materials for resale,and still nothing has been done.
